metadata.title: Preliminary Standing Stock and Biomass Estimates of Seabirds in the Subarctic Pacific Region

creators.name: Gerald A. Sanger of the University of Washington, Department of Oceanography, Seattle Washington.

metadata.description: To summarize existing information and ideas on the pelagic biology of seabirds in the region; to estimate standing stocks and the biomass of ecological groups of these birds; to estimate their annual food ingestion and the amount of feces voided, and; to develop a quantitative working hypothesis of how seabirds fit into a simple thypothetical food chain in the Central Subarctic Domain.
metadata.notes:
Purpose: To summarize existing information and ideas on the pelagic biology of seabirds in the region; to estimate standing stocks and the biomass of ecological groups of these birds; to estimate their annual food ingestion and the amount of feces voided, and; to develop a quantitative working hypothesis of how seabirds fit into a simple thypothetical food chain in the Central Subarctic Domain.
